result.name: losses-and-special-payments
result.notes: A master register is maintained recording details of special payments made and losses (including losses due to theft) incurred by the Department throughout the financial year. The majority of the special payments relate to personal injury claims from ex PSA staff.

organization.name: department-for-communities-and-local-government
organization.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
organization.description:
The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government's (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-housing-communities-and-local-government

result.title: Losses and special payments

extras.value: Release would be dependant on establishing an appropriate way of removing personal information, which may be sensitive, whilst retaining data integrity. However, the Department's Annual Report and Accounts do reflect the Managing Public Money and HM Treasury's Financial Reporting Manual requirement for statements showing losses and special payments by value and type where they exceed £250k in total or those which individually exceed £250k'.
